japanese: 指示を出すのはお前たち２人か。
translation: So you two are going to give directions.

japanese: よろしくね、フータロー君。
translation: Do your best, Futaro-kun.

japanese:
上杉さんのこと、
必ずスイカまで送り届けてみせますよ！
translation:
I'll try hard to guide you to the watermelon,
Uesugi-san!

japanese:
（……四葉は嘘をつくのが下手だ。
　一花が俺をからかおうとしても、
　四葉の反応に注意しておけば楽勝だな）
translation:
(...Yotsuba's no good at lying. Even if Ichika
 tries to tease me, if I pay attention
 to Yotsuba's reactions, it's an easy win.)

japanese: では、目隠ししますね。
translation: Alright, I'll blindfold you now.

japanese: それじゃ、よーい……スタート！
translation: Okay, and... START!

japanese: そのまま真っ直ぐ進めば大丈夫だよ！
translation: You should just go straight!

japanese: 上杉さん、いい感じです！
translation: Uesugi-san, you're doing well!

japanese: （……今は、まっすぐ進めてるのか）
translation: (...So I'm going forward now.)

japanese: あれっ？　少し横にそれたかな？
translation: Hm? You're kinda going to the side, I think?

japanese:
ああ、そっちに行くと危ないです！
戻ってください！
translation:
Aah, don't go that way, it's dangerous!
Come back!

japanese:
（戻るってどっちに戻ればいいんだ？
　危ないようだし後ろに下がるか……）
translation:
(Which way is going back to them?
 If she says it's dangerous,
 I'll back up a little...)

japanese:
上杉さーん！
体の向きです！　向きが違うんですよー！
translation:
Uesugi-saaan!
Your body! It's facing in the wrong direction!

japanese:
（向きと言われても、どっちかわからん。
　とりあえず右回りに……）
translation:
(That doesn't tell me where to go.
 I'll just turn right...)

japanese:
フータロー君、困っちゃってるねぇ。
それなら……。
translation:
Futaro-kun, you're really struggling, aren't you.
Okay then...

japanese: そのまま向きを変えながら進めば大丈夫だよ！
translation:
If you just keep turning that way and moving forward,
you'll be fine!

japanese:
ああ！　通りすぎました！
戻ってくださーい！
translation:
Aahh! You went too far!
Come back!

japanese:
四葉、戻さなくて大丈夫だって。
あのまま進めば元に戻ってくるでしょ？
translation:
Yotsuba, you don't need to call him back.
If he keeps going, he'll naturally turn around, right?

japanese:
あ、ホントだ。
またスイカのほうに向かってるね。
上杉さーん！　そのままでオッケーですよー！
translation:
Ah, you're right.
He's headed for the watermelon again.
Uesugi-saaan! Just keep moving forward like that!

japanese:
（ええ……あいつらは納得してるが
　俺は今、どっちを向いてるんだ？
　同じところをグルグルと回ってる気分だ）
translation:
(Okay...they understand what's going on,
 but I have no idea where I'm facing. I feel like
 I'm going around in circles.)

japanese:
ほーらー、足がもつれてるよ！
もう１周してみよっ！
translation:
Look at you, your feet are tangled up!
Do one more lap!

japanese: やっぱり同じところを回ってるだけじゃねぇか！
translation: I'm just spinning in place!

japanese: あはは、バレちゃった。
translation: Ahaha, you caught me.

japanese:
まったく、お前ってやつは！
それと四葉、お前の指示も曖昧すぎて
まったくわからん。
translation:
Grr, you guys are always messing with me!
And Yotsuba, your instructions are way too vague.
I couldn't understand them at all.

japanese: すみません、うまく伝わってるかと思ってました。
translation:
Sorry,
I thought I was getting myself across pretty clearly.

japanese:
謝ることないって。
あれでわからないなら、
フータロー君がダメなんだよ。
translation:
There's no need to apologize.
If he can't understand based on that,
then that's Futaro-kun's problem.

japanese:
あんな指示じゃ無理だろ。
正しく進んでるのかもわからないんだぞ？
translation:
With instructions like that it's impossible.
I had no idea if I was going in the right direction.

japanese:
いえいえ、大体はあってましたよ？
ちょっと向きが違ってたかもしれませんが。
translation:
No no, you were mostly right.
Your direction was just a bit off.

japanese: おかげでグルグル回っちゃったけどねぇ。
translation: Because of that, you were just going in circles.

japanese:
そこはお前のせいだろ。
四葉も、進む向きが間違ってるなら
せめて方向くらいは言ってくれ。
translation:
That's your fault, isn't it?
And Yotsuba, if I'm headed in the wrong direction,
could you at least correct my path?

japanese:
あっ、それもそうですね。
すっかり忘れてました！
translation:
Ah, you're right, there's that.
I completely forgot that I should be doing that!

japanese:
仕方ないなぁ。
じゃあ、ちょっと交代してみよっか。
translation:
Ah, well.
Why don't we try switching?

japanese: じゃあ、やってみせろ。
translation: Alright, I'll show you how it's done.

japanese: おっ？　そうきましたか。
translation: Oh? That's how you're playing this?

japanese:
その口ぶりからして、
一花はあの四葉の指示でわかるんだろ？
translation:
You talk a big game but,
you think you can tell what's going on 
based on Yotsuba's instructions, right?

japanese: もちろん。
translation: Of course.

japanese:
ほーう、自信満々だな。
ぜひともお手並み拝見したいものだ。
translation:
Oh wow, aren't you confident.
Please, show me how it's done.

japanese:
オッケー、君にお手本を見せてあげましょう。
なんなら邪魔してもいいよ？
translation:
I'd love to.
Feel free to interfere as much as you want,
Futaro-kun.

japanese:
いや、俺は口を出さない。
それだと、お前にやらせる意味がないからな。
translation:
No, I won't say a word.
If I did, there's no point.

japanese:
俺の理解が足りてなかったか。
そこそこ長い付き合いになったし、
わかってきたつもりではいたんだがな。
translation:
I didn't understand well enough, huh.
We've known each other for quite a long time,
and I thought I was starting to figure things out.

japanese: いえいえ、上杉さんは悪くありませんよ！
translation: No, you haven't done anything wrong, Uesugi-san!

japanese:
まあ、そうだな。
お前の指示出しが下手なのも事実だ。
translation:
I guess you're right.
The fact is, the way you give instructions
is pretty bad.

japanese: え。
translation: Um.

japanese:
自分が考えたことの伝え方や、
相手が理解しやすい言い方を身につけたほうがいい。
translation:
You should learn to say what you think
in a way that's easy for others to understand.

japanese:
あはは……。
たまに言われます、それ。
translation:
Ahaha...
People tell me that sometimes.

japanese: じゃあ四葉、ちょっと私と練習してみようか？
translation: Okay, Yotsuba, why don't you try practicing with me?

japanese:
うん！
上杉さん、頑張りますから見ててくださいね！
translation:
Okay!
Uesugi-san, I'll do my best, so please watch!

japanese: 準備できたよー！
translation: The watermelon is ready!

japanese: あのー、なぜ一花がやることになっているのですか？
translation: Um, why is Ichika going to do it?

japanese: まあまあ、そこは気にしないで。
translation: Hey now, don't worry about that.

japanese:
それじゃ、一花さん！
よーい……スタート！
translation:
Okay, Ichika-san!
And... START!

japanese: 四葉、よろしくねー！
translation: Yotsuba, it's in your hands!

japanese:
うん！
一花、そのまま真っ直ぐで……
あ、ちょっとズレた！
translation:
Okay!
Ichika, go straight, just like that...
Ah, you're a little off!

japanese: ほいほいっと。
translation: Oopsie.

japanese: あー、今度は逆！
translation: Aah, now you're going the wrong way!

japanese: よっと。
translation: Woah now.

japanese:
いい感じ、そのまま進んで！
これなら絶対に行けるよ！
translation:
Good good, go straight!
You'll definitely get it now!

japanese: ん～、そろそろかな？
translation: Hmm, am I about there?

japanese: ドーンと一発やっちゃって！
translation: Smash it with one strike!

japanese: そーれっと！
translation: Hi-yah!

japanese:
やったね一花！
一発で決めちゃった！
translation:
Oh, NICE, Ichika!
You got it in one shot!

japanese: （ええー……あれでわかるのか……）
translation: (Well now... Ichika could understand that...?!)

japanese:
上杉さん、どうでした！？
私、さっきよりも上手に
指示出しできてた気がします！
translation:
Uesugi-san, how was that?!
I feel like I gave directions
better than before!

japanese:
えっ？　ああ……
さっきよりはましだったんじゃないか？
translation:
Huh? Yeah...
I think this time was a little better.

japanese:
四葉、指示ありがと。
おかげで思ってたより楽勝だったよ。
translation:
Yotsuba, thanks for guiding me.
Because of you, it was easier than
I thought it was going to be.

japanese:
えへへ、ちょっと自信が出てきたよ。
上杉さんのときに上手にできなかったのが
悔しいなぁ。
translation:
Hehehe, I'm feeling a little more confident.
It's frustrating that I couldn't do it well
with Uesugi-san.

japanese:
君もちゃんと見ててくれた？
これが五つ子の絆だよ。
translation:
Were you paying attention?
That's the bond of quintuplets.

japanese:
ああ、しっかりと見てたぞ。
ただ絆というよりも、俺とお前たちの
信頼関係の差な気がしてきた。
translation:
Yes, I saw it clearly.
Rather than just a bond, I felt that
there was a difference in trust between you guys and me.

japanese:
もう、負け惜しみ言っちゃって。
納得いかないって顔してるじゃん。
translation:
Oh, what a sore loser.
You still don't look convinced.

japanese: くっ……。
translation: Urk...

japanese: もうちょっと頑張らないとね、フータロー君。
translation: You've gotta try a little harder, Futaro-kun.

japanese:
上杉さん！　ファイトです！
私は上杉さんのこと信頼してますから！
translation:
Uesugi-san! Fight!
I trust you, Uesugi-san!

japanese:
いくら五つ子だからって言われても、
納得できないものは――！？
translation:
No matter how many times you tell me it's because you're
quintuplets, I'll never be able to understand%p-2;――%p;!!

japanese: フータロー君。
translation: Futaro-kun.

japanese: なんだよ？
translation: What is it?

japanese:
そんなことじゃ、
いつまでたっても距離は縮まらないぞ？
translation:
An attitude like that won't get you any closer, 
now will it?

japanese: えっ？
translation: What?

japanese: 頑張ってね。
translation: Do your best!
